sentences.en: Almost all fictional detectives are unreal.
sentences.cn: 几乎所有小说中的侦探都是虚构的。

sentences.en: For the moment she had become unreal to him.
sentences.cn: 一瞬间,在他眼里,她变得不真实了.

sentences.en: He lives in an unreal world imagined by himself.
sentences.cn: 他生活在自己想像的虚幻世界里.

sentences.en: I've never seen anything so unreal in my life.
sentences.cn: 在我的一生中还从未见过如此虚幻的东西.

sentences.en: It seemed unreal to be sitting and talking to someone so famous.
sentences.cn: 和这么一位大名鼎鼎的人坐在一起谈话似乎很不真实。

sentences.en: It was so unreal that I broke into a fit of giggles.
sentences.cn: 这实在很离奇，我忍不住咯咯笑了起来。

sentences.en: It was unreal. Like some crazy childhood nightmare.
sentences.cn: 这不是真的，就像儿时的某个荒唐的噩梦一样。

sentences.en: My eyes burned and my voice sounded unreal.
sentences.cn: 我的眼睛发热,声音也不象我自己的了.

sentences.en: Oh, I can't explain it. It's just unreal. Everybody is so happy.
sentences.cn: 啊，我都没法形容。就是太棒了，每个人都很高兴。

sentences.en: Our agreement was a temporary one, superficial and unreal.
sentences.cn: 我们的一致是暂时的 、 表面的、虚假的.

sentences.en: She had never hung so near the dizzy brink of the unreal.
sentences.cn: 她从未接近过如此虚无飘渺的境界.

sentences.en: The party began to take on an unreal, almost nightmarish quality.
sentences.cn: 聚会开始呈现出虚幻、近乎梦魇般的气氛。

sentences.en: The speech seemed a little forced and unreal.
sentences.cn: 这番话说得有点不自然,不真实.

sentences.en: The violence in those films was too unreal, it was make-believe.
sentences.cn: 那些影片里的暴力场面太不真实了，都是假的。

sentences.en: The whole evening seemed strangely unreal.
sentences.cn: 整个晚上的事似乎如梦幻般令人生奇.

sentences.en: They seemed unreal and kind of tatty.
sentences.cn: 这些礼拜仪式似乎不是真实的且显得有点寒酸.

trans.tran_cn: 不真实的，假的，幻想的，虚构的，非现实的，虚幻
trans.tran_en: an experience, situation etc that is unreal seems so strange that you think you must be imagining it
